Generation IV.Diamond: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.
Generation IV.Pearl: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."
Generation IV.Platinum: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A powerful Pokémon that can split huge boulders with ease. Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep within the mountains, playing with the snow.
